name: get_role_details
description: Get the public details of a specified role in the game.

role_info.name: Bodyguard
abilities: Protect one player each night from attacks (counterattacks attackers).
Use a bulletproof vest on self once per game.

mechanics.protection: Can protect a target from one attack each night, counterattacking the attacker. Both Bodyguard and attacker suffer a Powerful Attack.
mechanics.vest: If targeting self, consumes vest, grants Basic Defense for the night. Vest does not counterattack.
mechanics.multiple_attackers: If multiple killers attack the protected target, Bodyguard kills one attacker and dies; others can still attack.
exceptions: Cannot protect from Jailor executions, Veteran alerts, Ambusher, Medusa (gazing at home), Hex Master, Arsonists, Jesters.
Cannot save another Bodyguard dying in a counterattack.
Some attacks (e.g., Pestilence, Juggernaut with Powerful Attack) may kill Bodyguard and/or target.

notifications: If you die protecting, your death will state 'died guarding someone.'
Killed attackers see 'was killed by a Bodyguard.'
Specific notifications for interactions with Necromancer, Pirate, Serial Killer, etc.
notes: Cannot be a Lover or VIP.
If multiple Bodyguards protect the same target, each counters a separate attacker.
